macro.name: oopGetInstance
macro.brief: Returns an object pointer starting from an interface pointer.
macro.details:
Because multiple inheritance, an object can implement multiple interfaces.
This macro returns the pointer to the base object starting from a pointer to any of its composing classes or interfaces. This is done by using the @p offsetof() macro in @p stdlib.h.
macro.param: Name of the interface field within the class structure.
Pointer to the interface field within the class structure.
macro.return: A pointer to an object of type @p c implementing the interface @p ifname.
